Class BotPlayer

java.lang.Object
Player
BotPlayer
public class BotPlayer
extends Player
This is a class for the AI bot Player and calculations for Artificial Intelligence. Also this class extends from Player class.

      public void findAndSetBestPlaceToPutTaw()
      This is a method to find the best place which is better to put taw The best place in here means a place that will increase the most player's taw My Algorithm is that I simulate all the next possible moves and pick the best one .
